title: By the King, a proclamation for the discovery of the death of John Powell, late of London, merchant
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
publisher: Printed by John Bill, Christopher Barker, Thomas Newcomb and Henry Hills ...,
notes: "Given at our court at Whitehall, the two and twentieth day of November, 1678, in the thirtieth year of our reign."
Reproduction of original in the Harvard Library.
